General.Name: American Pacific Mining Corp
General.Description: American Pacific Mining Corp., a gold exploration company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in the Western United States. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It owns interest in the Gooseberry project, which consist of 42 unpatented claims covering an area of approximately 708 acres located in Storey Nevada, the United States. In addition, the company holds interest in Palmer Project located in Haines, Alaska; Madison Project located in Montana; and Gooseberry Project located in Nevada. Further, it holds interest in Tuscarora Project, Red Hill Project, and South Lida Project located in Nevada. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3A8
